content: Pipe adapter SCM PCA ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features High-quality Hilti accessories for maximum productivity Compatible with your Hilti circular saws Applications Guide rails - providing a straight track for the saw to move along while cutting Clamps - keeping the guide rail in place for accurate cuts Tool cases - for carrying your circular saw accessories ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Adapter pipe cutting Product information: Pipe cutting adapter for the SCM 22-A for pipes from 60mm to 1000mm with max. wall thickness of 6mmSCM PCA Additional Accessory Information: Pipe cutting adapter for the SCM 22-A for pipes from 60mm to 1000mm with max. wall thickness of 6mmSCM PCA Technical Data | Accessory type | Adapter pipe cutting | Product information | Pipe cutting adapter for the SCM 22-A for pipes from 60mm to 1000mm with max. wall thickness of 6mmSCM PCA | Additional Accessory Information | Pipe cutting adapter for the SCM 22-A for pipes from 60mm to 1000mm with max. wall thickness of 6mmSCM PCA ### ITEMS- 2149415 - Pipe adapter SCM PCA - Package Size 1 pc
